sentences.en: Underneath this image of normalcy, addiction threatened to rip this family apart.
sentences.cn: 在这一切正常的表象下，藏着一个让这个家庭破裂的毒瘾。

sentences.en: Indeed, the World Cup brought a kind of normalcy to South African life.
sentences.cn: 的确，世界杯给南非人的生活带来了一种正常状态。

sentences.en: It represented normalcy, in other words, a precious commodity in that place.
sentences.cn: 这展现了一种常态，换句话说，文化在那里是非常宝贵的东西。
